articles.author: Adveith Nair, Mark Bergen
articles.title: The Abu Dhabi Fund Helping Bankroll Trump’s $100 Billion AI Plan - Bloomberg
articles.description: A day after his inauguration as US President, Donald Trump unveiled a $100 billion venture to fund artificial intelligence infrastructure, backed by three of the biggest names in tech - OpenAI, SoftBank Group Corp. and Oracle Corp. Then there was an Abu Dhabi…
